about:
Hello, I am Alex!
I got into programming because of my passion for logical thinking. The process of web development is always challenging and incredibly interesting, and I often find myself deeply immersed in solving problems. I aim to continuously improve my skills and work towards becoming a full-stack engineer in the future!

list.title: Frontend Technologies
list.content:
HTML5、CSS3、Tailwind css、Element UI、PrimeVue
Vue2 / Vue3 / Nuxt3、Typescript、Javascript、jQuery
RWD、i18n、Accessibility

list.title: Other Related Skills
list.content:
Google Map、Mapbox、Nginx、Github、Git Action
Line Liff、Google / Fb / Line Login、Line / Telegram Bot
Node.js、Express

list.title: Omniguider Inc. (Foxconn Group) - Frontend Engineer
list.subtitle: Responsibilities: Government project web development, 2D/3D map applications
list.description: Primarily responsible for frontend development, API integration, using Vue3 and Nuxt3 frameworks. Implementing web animations and map-related applications such as route planning and simulated navigation as per design requirements.

website.name: THSR T-masS x Foxconn (Not yet launched)
Taipei Zoo - Map Navigation System
website.skills: Vue3 / Google Map / Web AR / Google Login / Accessibility A

website.name: Puli Winery AI Smart Guide System (Mobile/Kiosk Version)

list.title: Future Game Co., Ltd. - Frontend Engineer
list.subtitle: Responsibilities: Game official websites, event pages, and backend system development
list.description: Primarily responsible for frontend development, API integration, proficient in using Vue2 and Vue3 frameworks for web development. Built multiple game official websites and event pages from scratch along with backend systems.

other.title: Other Projects
other.description: In my free time, I enjoy exploring new technologies and developing simple demos or complete web applications!

list.name: CardTime (A forum for card games: card search, deck building)
Pocky Opera House Event Page (Event Ended, Page Offline)
